definition: the part played by a person in bringing about a result, communicate
details:
noun
- the part played by a person in bringing about a result
= synonyms: contribution
- the allotment of some amount by dividing something
= example: the allotment of some amount by dividing something
= synonyms: parcel, portion
- a sharp steel wedge that cuts loose the top layer of soil
= synonyms: plowshare, ploughshare
- assets belonging to or due to or contributed by an individual person or group
= example: assets belonging to or due to or contributed by an individual person or group
= synonyms: portion, percentage, part
- any of the equal portions into which the capital stock of a corporation is divided and ownership of which is evidenced by a stock certificate
= example: any of the equal portions into which the capital stock of a corporation is divided and ownership of which is evidenced by a stock certificate
verb
- communicate
= example: communicate
- give out as one's portion or share
= synonyms: deal, apportion, divvy up, portion out
- have, give, or receive a share of
= example: have, give, or receive a share of
= synonyms: partake, partake in
- use jointly or in common
- have in common
= example: have in common
= synonyms: shared
